meanings.definition: A luxury seating area at a sports stadium or theater.
meanings.sent1: From the skybox, you can see the game up close.
meanings.sent2: The skybox was filled with VIP guests enjoying the show.
meanings.sent3: The skybox felt like a special hideout for the elite fans.
meanings.sent4: She watched the match from the skybox, feeling like a queen in her castle.
meanings.sent5: The view from the skybox was so clear, it felt like floating above the field.

meanings.definition: A private viewing area at a concert or event.
meanings.sent1: The skybox provided a secluded spot to enjoy the music.
meanings.sent2: They reserved a skybox for the exclusive event.
meanings.sent3: In the skybox, they felt like they had their own private show.
meanings.sent4: The skybox was their personal balcony to the performance.
meanings.sent5: From the skybox, the music sounded like a dream floating in the air.

meanings.definition: A small, enclosed area at the top of a building with a panoramic view.
meanings.sent1: The skybox on the rooftop offered a stunning view of the city.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the cityscape from the skybox.
meanings.sent3: The tiny skybox made them feel like giants overlooking the town.
meanings.sent4: In the skybox, they felt like they were on top of the world.
meanings.sent5: The sunset from the skybox painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
